data.prayer: Father, bless the state of Iowa with a multiplying movement of house churches.
data.verse: ...but indeed, as I live, all the earth will be filled with the glory of the Lord.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Iowa, United States
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Iowa, United States. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.section_summary: On average, 2 babies will be born in the next hour to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Iowa, United States.
data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself real to these new families.
Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 3,159,600 souls in Iowa and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.prayer: Father, help the 834,330 believers in Iowa to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 2,325,270 lost friends and neighbors.
Lord, remember the Tai Dam people. Make the Tai Dam people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Iowa that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 834,330 believers in Iowa, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.prayer: Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the state of Iowa, United States. Please, stir the 834,330 believers here to pray for awakening.

location.name: Iowa
location.cities_list: Des Moines, Cedar Rapids, Iowa City, Waterloo, Ames
